description: The EU's contingency plans for "no deal" include measures to ensure smooth air and road travel.
title: Brexit: EU sets out plans in case trade talks with UK fail
title_page: Brexit: EU sets out plans in case trade talks with UK fail - BBC News
maintext: The UK government says it will be studying the EU's proposals but has reiterated its determination to "take back control" - including of its waters. The promise is that Britain would never accept fishing terms that contradicted its new status as "an independent coastal state". In the puzzle that is Brexit, it may prove hard to find even a deal on how to cope with no deal.
